rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. Each number outside the grid is the difference of digits in the first and the last cell in the corresponding direction.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Each number outside the grid is the difference of digits in the first and the last cell in the corresponding direction.
